Articles.Content: You're a very unique and distinct poster around the community, and you have a good signature. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You are quite a normal poster around the forum! see you around a lot on inigma's shuttle!
You're a regular part of the community, and you've given lots of business to KME ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
A pleasure doing business with you guys!
You're a great person and you always make me laugh at times. I like you a lot. And I don't say that a lot.
I don't know you that well, but the times we have encountered you seem like a really cool and smart guy. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You build great crafts:)
Your avatar made me think of a way to make the Hunger Games 100 times better. Think fish.
KME stuff is amazing!
I can always count on you to give lots of compliments to KME ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
you guys impressed me, no wonder I compliment you guys so hard!
You're very nice and illusive.
You build amazing stuff, seemingly just for the "Show me your Rep-Worthy Crafts" thread...
Working for a quality company, a distinct name and avatar.. As well as a humorous sig. You awesome person. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cool username!

(But Beethoven sucks. Just my honest opinion. Still, username's cool & so are your posts)

> 
> Cool username!
> (But Beethoven sucks. Just my honest opinion. Still, username's cool & so are your posts)

Thank you! I'm often criticized for referencing to the Space Shuttle, especially that.. well.. it's fate was a disaster.

The fact that you really care about how your posts come off to the other person and it's quality shows a lot about how much of a good poster you are. Also, I like your sig and avatar! Really sets you apart. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Thank you! I'm often criticized for referencing to the Space Shuttle, especially that.. well.. it's fate was a disaster.
> The fact that you really care about how your posts come off to the other person and it's quality shows a lot about how much of a good poster you are. Also, I like your sig and avatar! Really sets you apart. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You know, that shuttle's fate really could have happened to any of them. It just happened to bring down the most famous.

Your usernmae reminds me of Finland (for some reason), which i find very neat. Youre also quite fun.

(There's probably nothing to compliment about me, im a horrible person ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

My posts are totally amazing and I am an absolute hoot ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Oh, wait... I am supposed to compliment others?

You're very honest (in a good way) and never fail to get your points straight and "nailed-right-in-the-head". I really like reading some of your posts. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Your profile picture is adorable ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Congrats on a long and happy life on the forums!
I like dogs.
I complement you because we totally do not go on a roleplay forum to play War of Insanity. Definitely not.

I complement you because your signature is just too beautiful! I literally stop and look at it for a few seconds whenever I see it. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
